title: Subchapter K - Adult, Continuing And Community Education
content:
Subchapter K - Adult, Continuing And Community Education

State Regulations

Part 157 - Adult Education (§ 157.1 to 157.2)

Part 158 - Education And Community Renewal Programs (§ 158.1 to 158.7)

Part 159 - Economic Development Skills Training Program And Entrepreneurial Assistance: Standards Of Instructional Quality For Training Programs (§ 159.1 to 159.2)

Part 160 - Related And Supplemental Instruction For Apprentices (§ 160.1 to 160.7)

Part 161 - Repealed (§ 161.1 to 161.2 to 161.6)

Part 162 - Tuition Awards For Vietnam, Persian Gulf, Afghanistan And Other Eligible Combat Veterans: Approval Requirements For Vocational Training Programs (§ 162.1 to 162.3)

Part 163 - Home Study Courses (§ 163.1)

Part 164 - Apportionments For Adult Basic Education And Literacy Programs (§ 164.1 to 164.7)

Part 165 - Occupational Retraining And Reemployment Act; Approval Requirements For Training Providers And Programs (§ 165.1 to 165.5 to 165.6)

Part 166 - Workplace Literacy Programs (§ 166.1 to 166.6)

Part 167 - State Education Responsibilities For Administration Of The Job Training Partnership Act; Eligibility Of Agencies And Selection Of Service Providers (§ 167.1 to 167.11)

Part 168 - Employment Preparation Education Programs (§ 168.1 to 168.6)

Part 169 - Employer Specific Training Grant Program (§ 169.1 to 169.5)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
